A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an incredible film\, truly a masterpiece by Rian Johnson. The development of both legacy characters and the newcomers hits just wonderfully. The action works tremendously and it's cinematically beautiful. From a canon perspective\, it slides in perfectly with the rest of the saga\, novels\, comics.etc.  \n\nI never thought a Star Wars movie could be better than The Empire Strikes Back. I was wrong. If I could pay extra money for this ticket\, I would to reward the filmmakers for giving us this beautiful piece of art. The Last Jedi is not only the gold-standard for Lucasfilm\, but the greatest film Disney has ever produced.
